AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Summon your courage to talk to her before she loses interest!\nComing on a whim, the great painter, Dusk, puts only the finishing touches on all jobs.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Eyjafjalla
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Hardworking and earnest all the time.\nEyjafjalla, Caster Operator of Rhodes Island, has wanted to devote herself to doing something for you.
She was born to set things on fire, and it has become a hobby of hers.\nIfrit, former test subject of Rhine Lab, will incinerate all of Silence's enemies.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Mint
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Curiosity is her greatest weapon.\nMint, the Victorian Caster, seeks recognition as a scholar far more than as a Caster.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Mostima
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: You'll have to find her first.\nMostima, Senior Messenger, will lay low all obstacles in your path with her Arts.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Skyfire
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Fine her if she triggers the fire alarm again!\nSkyfire, Operator from King's Wand, is ready to burn anyone foolish enough to stand in her way.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Absinthe
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Unlike last time, she perhaps can once again take up the mantle of a protector.\nAbsinthe, Caster Operator, is always ready to eliminate any threats.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Amiya
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Keep fighting, Doctor.\nAmiya, leader of Rhodes Island, will fight alongside you.

AK_DLL.OperatorDef.name: Ceobe
AK_DLL.OperatorDef.description: Knocks 'em down one after another, fast and accurate.\nCeobe is always ready to go after the bad guys.
